title: Brandon Bays
text:
Brandon Bays (born August 21, 1953) is an American author and <a href="motivational%20speaker">motivational speaker</a>. She has authored <a href="New%20Thought">New Thought</a> <a href="self-help">self-help</a> books, and is best known for her 1999 book, "The Journey", which became a bestseller in England and Australia.
She was born in <a href="New%20York%20City">New York City</a> to an American father and a Romanian mother, who grew up in Vienna, Austria.
"The Journey".
"The Journey" (1999) was her first book. "Publishers Weekly" said in its review that the book would appeal to some but others would be put off by the certainty of her self-belief.
